A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Rian Johnson didn't do his homework! 

No lightsaber fight for the first time ever. 

Rian Johnson has destroyed Luke Skywalker's character as he is now full of fear. Logically this should mean he's turning to the dark side but apparently not. 

Medicholrian spirits can now affect the physical world with immense power! Yet they don't help out with any of the fighting despite the light side being so outnumbered..? 

Leia does something only one properly trained in the force can do. 

Rey is doing things that take years of Jedi school yet she doesn't even really get trained in the movie! 

Bad guys killed off before even putting up a fight\, BORING. 

And some acts of "the force" which have never been in the Star Wars universe and do not fit!
